attributes.action: Stop stagecoach stopping the 36 via kinloss bus
attributes.background: Stagecoach have confirmed they are stopping the 36 service that goes through kinloss, findhorn etc. On the route they go up Forbes hill which is where most of the elderly get on and off. Please sign this to hopefully stop this from happening! Kinloss residence should not have to pay for taxis!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for local bus services. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
